Headline: Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks near Harlem. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks near Harlem.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
